allSegments.contentHtml:
I'm Alan Ionita

Software Developer from Manchester. ☀️

Working at Perceptual Robotics

Building industry 4.0 products.

Instructor at The University of Manchester

Teaching Fullstack Web Development

Mentor at Codebar

Free monthly programming workshops for diverse communities.

Co-organiser of CodeYourFuture MCR

Non-profit coding school for refugees.
